ceo_note: This isn't just a car, it's a statement from a tech giant. Pay close attention to its smart cockpit integration and how it challenges Tesla's software dominance. Its real-world battery performance will be the key.
The ET9 is NIO's technological flagship, a 'land jet' aimed at the Maybach and Panamera class. Its 900V architecture and steer-by-wire system are industry-leading technologies to watch.

The Seal is BYD's direct answer to the Tesla Model 3, built on their advanced e-Platform 3.0 with Cell-to-Body battery tech. Its driving dynamics and value proposition are its strongest selling points globally.
